name: Christmas Pictures
description:
An educational Christmas game that will help your child to have fun and develop memory.
The design in the game is very colorful and bright.
With it you will immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the New Year and Christmas holidays.
Have fun, adults and children, strengthening the memory!
------------------------

Feel free to rate the game and leave comments.
The game is free, donation is optional, but if you want, I will not mind, thank you very much :)
------------------------
Game controls:
mouse
------------------------
Special thanks to all the guys who share their assets !!!
Graphics: 
*Robert Brooks
*Roboxel
*Renderman 
------------------------
